Join RennerBrown and Cherwell for

No-Code During a Crisis

In a world where priorities are shifting daily it is more important than ever to have a system that can rapidly evolve with your business. A solution that can drive Digital Transformation efforts while improving your ITSM maturity.

Discover how organizations are:
  • Reducing implementation time and cost by up to 50%
  • Speeding up delivery and time to market
  • Reducing the need for skilled developers
  • Delivering Services efficiently, automating processes and providing modern day service experiences
Low Code Development

Cherwell CORE provides a no-code development and delivery platform, enabling you to create and modify metadata configuration files via visual editors without requiring coding or programming expertise.

Integration Services

Cherwell CORE provides a comprehensive set of RESTful API commands for extending capabilities and integrations.

Workflow Automation

Automating workflows is the heart of the Cherwell CORE. Cherwell provides process workflows and supporting capabilities for ITSM, HR, Facilities, PPM, Security and other solutions that run on the common platform.

Agenda

  • Introduction - Approx. 5 minutes
  • Cherwell No-Code ITSM platform demo - Approx. 20 minutes
  • RennerBrown testimonial - Approx. 20 minutes
  • Q & A session - Approx. 10 minutes

  • All attendees will recieve a free Business Value Assessment ($1960 value) that includes
